titleInfo.title: Interior of Isadore Solomon's Store in Solomonville, Arizona

physicalDescription.extent: 1 item (photograph), 4 x 5 inches, black and white
physicalDescription.note: Handwritten on envelope: "#203 Weinberger Family of Arizona, 1887-1963." On back of photograph: "Isadore Solomon's Store, Solomonville, Arizona. Jacob Weinberger of Denver married Blanche Solomon 1907 #203."

mods.abstract: An unidentified group of people inside Isadore Solomon's store in Solomonville, Arizona. Some of the people may be members of the Weinberger family.
mods.accessCondition: Copyright restrictions may apply. User is responsible for all copyright compliance.
